headline: Assessing Airbnb (ABNB) Valuation After Strong Q4 Results And Growth Initiatives
summary: Why Airbnb’s latest conference appearance matters for investors Airbnb (ABNB) is back in focus after Q4 results highlighted revenue growth of 12%, Gross Booking Value up 16%, and record free cash flow of US$4.6b. These results are setting the stage for its upcoming Bernstein tech forum appearance. See our latest analysis for Airbnb. Airbnb’s recent Q4 update and upcoming Bernstein forum slot come after a 90 day share price return of 15.49% and a 1 year total shareholder return decline of...
